name: Scrap Spaceship
description:
Scrap Spaceship

Build a spaceship from scratch, using some scrap parts from various wrecks. Then, venture into the auto-turret infested darkness of space and destroy as many of them as you can. Try to get a high score!

Game made for Ludum Dare 45 (October 2019). The theme is "Start With Nothing". The theme was a bit of a disappointment, but I'm still happy with the weird game I made.

Note that only the Web and Windows builds have been tested.

Controls

F11 to toggle fullscreen

Construction controls:
Click to release a part
WASD to move
1/2/3 to switch parts
L to launch ship when you're ready

Ship controls:
Space to fire thrusters
Click to shoot
Shift to brake

Todo List

  • Fix the movement controls. There are a few minor bugs that are annoying.
  • Make the info at the top buttons so you don't need to press 1/2/3.
  • Encourage players to have at least one thruster and turret before launching.
  • Perhaps add a couple more types of parts.
  • Add more variety in enemies.
  • Add powerups, or perhaps just extra floating parts you can pick up during the second phase.
